name: Nameless Champion
effect: This champion can't level up. 6: Draw a card and put a level counter on Nameless Champion. Activate this ability only once. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)

name: Amorphous Missile
effect: Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.) 1, : Load Amorphous Missile into target unloaded Ranger weapon you control.

name: Bellona's Runestone
effect: Banish Bellona's Runestone: Target weapon you control gets +2 until end of turn. Put a durability counter on that weapon.
flavor: Her passion for weapons burned hotter than the very hearth where she forged them.

name: Clandestine Chart
effect: 2, Banish Clandestine Chart: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on your champion.
flavor: The true battle begins long before a single step is taken on the battlefield.

name: Cowl of the Wild
effect: As long as you control one or more non-Human Tamer allies, your champion gets +1 level.
flavor: Even the most defiant and untamable of beasts can be swayed with proper knowledge, patience, and respect.

name: Duxal Proclamation
effect: Banish Duxal Proclamation: Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if each opponent controls no allies.
flavor: A war chant passed down through generations, said to ignite courage and inspire unwavering resolve in all who hear it.

name: Etherealys' Promise
effect: Whenever an ally you control dies, put a refinement counter on Etherealys' Promise. Then if there are three or more refinement counters on Etherealys' Promise, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.

name: Fauna Friend
effect: : Target non-Human ally gets +1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you have two or more non-Human ally cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Those who frequent the forests know how to communicate with its inhabitants. For example, moving the hand in a wave motion attracts squirrels.

name: Gem of Sorority
effect: Banish Gem of Sorority: Empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)
flavor: Most mages of old scoffed at the new magic the sisters created, but their mischievous innovations have since enlightened many of today's champions.

name: Gossamer Staff
effect: 1, : Empower 1. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +1 level.)
flavor: They say the Exarch of Light drew crowds during Revelfest, but the goddess hasn't appeared since, leaving many more curious to see for themselves.

name: Halcyon Prism
effect: Banish Halcyon Prism: Glimpse 3. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: Many seek to see the future, yet are unprepared for the truths they'll uncover.

name: Intwined Bangle
effect: Level 2+ 3, : Put a buff counter on target non-Human ally you control. (Allies get +1 and +1 for each buff counter on them.)
flavor: The path of a god is one of glory but also one of solitude.  Those who ascend to the highest peaks hold dear the bonds they cherish.

name: Marksman's Charm
effect: Banish Marksman's Charm: Target unit gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
flavor: With the divine blessing from the goddess of hunt, every shot is sure to find its mark with unwavering certainty.

name: Naga's Fang
effect: Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Naga's Fang gets +1 until end of turn.
flavor: Sharper yet are the fangs of the serpent god, wielder of chaos.

name: Ninja Tabi
effect: Banish Ninja Tabi: You gain agility 3 for this turn. Activate this ability only at slow speed. (Agility 3 — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)
flavor: It is the Inari way.

name: Oathbreaker's Justice
effect: As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 3.
flavor: Power comes with a price.

name: Phantom Veil
effect: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) 2: Linked ally gains stealth until end of turn. (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)

name: Prismatic Codex
effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put an age counter on Prismatic Codex. Banish Prismatic Codex: Ignore the elemental requirements of the next card you activate this turn. Activate this ability only if there are three or more age counters on Prismatic Codex.

name: Prismatic Perseverance
effect: Level 2+ Damage 15+ All elements are enabled for you.
flavor: All living creatures, even humans, undergo profound transformation when subjected to immense duress.

name: Protector's Plate
effect: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) Linked ally gets +1 and has intercept.
flavor: The armor feels fuller with each life that is spared.

name: Sage's Urn
effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, if there are less than four age counters on Sage's Urn, put an age counter on it. Banish Sage's Urn: Empower X, where X is the amount of age counters on Sage's Urn.

name: Sanguine Goblet
effect: Whenever your champion takes damage, put that many blood counters on Sanguine Goblet. Banish Sanguine Goblet: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if Sanguine Goblet has eight or more blood counters on it.

name: Shield of Parvati
effect: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) If linked ally would take damage, prevent 2 of that damage and sacrifice Shield of Parvati instead.
flavor: Justice cannot be attained without sacrifice.

name: Sojourner's Hunt
effect: (Bow — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.) : Sojourner's Hunt becomes a weapon subtype of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn.

name: Spectral Beacon
effect: 1, Banish Spectral Beacon: Banish target card in a graveyard.
flavor: Illuminate restless souls that linger, haunting those who have wronged them, so that they may at last find peace.

name: Training Sword
flavor: When one begins their journey, they must first master the fundamentals of combat, stripped of ornament or flourish.

name: Veilara's Promise
effect: Whenever you activate a Spell card, put a refinement counter on Veilara's Promise. Then if there are three or more refinement counters on Veilara's Promise, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.

name: Winged Talaria
effect: 2, Banish Winged Talaria: Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
flavor: These enchanted sandals are said to carry their wearer to wherever their destiny calls.

name: Prismatic Spirit
effect: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
flavor: A beautiful dance of color and the enmeshment of elements make manifest its prismatic brilliance.
